title: Technology and Media
sentences: portátil para trabajar en la cafetería.
I use my laptop computer to work in the coffee shop.
mi móvil porque no tiene batería.
I have to charge my mobile because it has no battery.
I received a text message from my brother.
Can you pass me your headphones to listen to music?
una foto nueva a mi red social.
Tomorrow I am going to upload a new photo to my social network.
esta aplicación gratis en tu teléfono.
You can download this application for free on your phone.
de mi tablet está un poco sucia.
The screen of my tablet is a bit dirty.
para moverme por la página web.
I use the mouse to move through the webpage.
No puedo escribir bien porque el
I can't write well because the keyboard is broken.
Have you read the email I sent you yesterday?
I need a new charger for my laptop.
The car speaker sounds very loud.
I like to surf/browse the internet before sleeping.
I am going to delete the files I don't need.
el documento antes de cerrar el programa.
Don't forget to save the document before closing the program.
Can you share your location with me?
Tengo muchas fotos guardadas en esta
I have many photos saved in this folder.
en el texto para más información.
There is a link in the text for more information.
What is your profile on this app?
The video you posted is very funny.
no tiene papel, tengo que comprar más.
The printer has no paper; I have to buy more.
estas fotos para ponerlas en la pared.
I want to print these photos to put them on the wall.
How can this device be turned off?
You have to turn on the light to see better.
dictionary:
El ordenador - The computer
La contraseña - The password
Cargar - To charge
El mensaje - The message
Los auriculares - The headphones
Subir - To upload
Descargar - To download
La pantalla - The screen
El ratón - The mouse
El teclado - The keyboard
El correo electrónico - The email
El cargador - The charger
El altavoz - The speaker
Navegar - To surf / To browse
Borrar - To delete
Guardar - To save
Compartir - To share
La carpeta - The folder
El enlace - The link
El perfil - The profile
El vídeo - The video
La impresora - The printer
Imprimir - To print
Apagar - To turn off
Encender - To turn on
